data.title: We belong to a leading global distributor of pharmaceuticals
data.text:
By the end of 2019, you were informed about the acqusition of majority share in IMCoPharma by Netherlands based company Barentz. We have prepared avideo from Pharmtech & Ingredients 2019 in Moscow, where representatives of both Barentz and IMCoPharma commented on this fact. The second part of the video is dedicated to interviews with our business partners from Lusochimica and Amino, who shared their views on pharma industry in the CIS countries and mutual cooperation with IMCoPharma in this region.

We are very pleased to present our new corporate video! Gain an insight into main company’s acitivites – who we are and what we do.

Watch a video from Pharmtech & Ingredients exhibition, held in November 2018 in Moscow. Besides a short overview from the venue, in the video you can also find the interviews – with Mrs. Iolanta Morozenkova, CEO of IMCoPharma's Branch in Russia, and the interview with our business partner from Roquette, Mr. Dmitry Zateev, Business Development Manager, GBU Pharma & Health Europe.

From the 28th to 30th of March 2017 IMCoPharma participated in the pharmaceutical exhibiton IPhEB & CPhI Russia 2017 which took place in Moscow. Watch a short video from the venue IPhEB & CPhI Russia 2017 including interviews with our business partners from Fareva and Medichem as well as a brief summary from the event.

IMCoPharma participated at Pharmtech & Ingredients 2016. The four days exhibition was held in Moscow (Russia) from 22-25 November 2016. Watch a short video from the venue and the interview with the Commercial Director, Mr. Lukas Adamec, speaking on the subject of main activities of IMCoPharma company as well as the importance to participate at such events.
